alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Landry; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Iberia, northeastern St. Mary, St. Martin and eastern St. Landry Parishes through 745 AM CDT... At 659 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Batchelor to Lottie to near Butte La Rose to 8 miles east of Lake Fausse Pointe to near Stephensville. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Morgan City, Catahoula, Breaux Bridge, Franklin, St. Martinville, Patterson, Jeanerette, Berwick, Krotz Springs, Melville, Bayou Vista, Stephensville, Baldwin, Henderson, Loreauville, Patterson Memorial Airport, Butte La Rose, Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge and Sorrel. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 113 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Landry; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin
